scenario.name: uac send 491
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "Pending Test Wout Re-INVITE" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 123456 654321 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "Pending Test Wout Re-INVITE" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=- 123456 654322 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=image [auto_media_port] udptl t38 a=T38FaxVersion:0 a=T38MaxBitRate:14400 a=T38FaxRateManagement:transferredTCF

ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[$last_branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0
SIP/2.0 491 Request Pending Via:[$re_inv_via] From:[$re_inv_from] To:[$re_inv_to] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$re_inv_cseq] INVITE Content-Length: 0
